refnamediv.refpurpose: This function returns the serialization of the current node like XPATH function 'serialize()', i.e. a text in XML syntax.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: This function returns the serialization of the current node. This is similar to the XPATH function 'serialize()', i.e. a text in XML syntax.

example.title: A table with an XMLType column
example.para: This populates a table with XML data and then selects string representation of 'ename' element from the appropriate record.
